text: What if in the office rp we added some suit bondage? I have no idea what I mean by that phrase but combining Choro in a suit and tie with bondage sounds like a good idea
(( I agree! Maybe Tanaka takes him to a meeting where there's a couple of employees he meets with and he's nearby, all tied up and looking sharp in a suit and tie

(( with the Matsu movie coming out, delinquent Jyushi has been on my mind a lot. I had an idea that involved rivals from another school kidnapping him and breaking him down from a haughty bad boy to a desperate, whiny puppy pet
I absolutely adore both ideas. Especially delinquent Jyushi. He could become the de facto mascot for the rival delinquent group and I’m really digging the idea of a spiked collar

(( ohh a spiked collar sounds lovely! and him being a mascot is sweet too!

I also had /another/ idea that's experimental, but I thought it sounded fun and we can always tweak it. Basically, at least one Matsu gets kidnapped and enslaved, and their master is a bit of an otaku that likes video games. So he creates a kind of program that chooses random punishments/roles/types of bondage for the Matsu(s) to be forced into, which would be decided by us using a randomizer. Maybe even have different locations that would be decided this way, probably from an immersive VR system so the affected Matsu can't leave their master's house
(( I have quite a few lists written up to be randomized, such as types of bondage, gags, roles, and locations.
Holy shit that’s a great idea! I’m honestly down for adding both to our impressively long list
(( alright sweet! and yeah, we do have an impressive amount of RPs
Very much so
Also maybe instead of being kidnapped in real life it’s a VR game that a Matsu joins and then gets hacked to where he can’t log out and the same principles still apply?

(( sure, that works! Maybe he's at a public VR event and the machine and headset he's hooked to gets hacked? Maybe the hacker blackmails some folks into doing what the randomizer says (for example, switching gags or using toys on the Matsu) or else he'll put them in the same position.
(( I also like the idea of the Matsu wearing body sensors in the VR game, so he can feel pain and sensations
That sounds cool!

(( awesome! it'll be an interesting change for me to play as a group of unwilling tormentors, and the guy behind it all. They'd probably grow corrupt over time and start to enjoy seeing the Matsu locked into different states of bondage. They might start to see the Matsu's torment as a sort of job with reward benefits
And a change of pace is always good!
(( yeah! which Matsu would you want to play as?
Hmm probably Kara?
(( I was thinking Kara would be a pretty good fit
Cool! Do you want to put a thing in the directory and start ya off?
((Yeah! I'll put it up asap
((Posted!
Got it!
Do you want me to put the delinquent Jyushi in the directory and do a starter for that?
(( sure!
Alright I’ll put it up but it might be a bit before I respond and put the starter
